programme.desc: Lazlo's friendship with Raj suffers because Raj has only one thing on his mind: marshmallows!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening in Brickabuild. Clockwork Mouse is giving all sorts of confusing orders to the builders and everything is chaos. Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on her clockwork key and it's making her run slowly. Noddy decides to investigate and find out who could have tried to damage the little mouse. Following all the clues and keeping track of all the evidence in his WhoWhatWhere Tablet, Noddy finds that the trail leads him to Carlton! But Carlton adores Clockwork Mouse! Noddy discovers that poor Carlton didn't meant to damage her; he just wanted to help her rest and not work so hard. Noddy has a brilliant idea. If Clockwork Mouse and Carlton work together, they can get all their jobs finished in half the time. And then there'll be plenty of time to rest – and play! Good idea Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots

programme.title: United Plates Of America

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

But when he accidentally stumbles into Klaus and Veruca, he and Blade awkwardly reunite while giving chase, and work through their differences. But the mysterious figure has followed Po and tries to capture them, clearly a new threat to our team.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: With a map from the comic book, Po and Blade make the treacherous journey through the desert to the lost city, and once inside they find the guardian of the fire whip, Rukhmini. The mysterious figure, a stag named Colin, forges an uneasy alliance with Klaus and Veruca.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: On the brink of his highly-anticipated White Coat Ceremony at school, Jin proudly dons his new white doctor’s coat around town, unwittingly drawing the attention of a creature named Morty. After a slobbery lick from Morty, Jin turns invisible! As Jin frantically tries to become re-visible, he discovers that Morty is very pregnant! Ultimately, Jin foregoes his ceremony and instead delivers Morty’s five babies.

programme.title: Abominable and The Invisible City
programme.desc: Already stretched thin between responsibilities, Yi discovers one of Morty’s babies still in her building. She attempts to juggle her various responsibilities dumpling shop work, violin, magical creature childcare!), but it’s too much and she accidentally “loses” Mini-Morty. She’s going to need help from Jin and Peng to find Mini-Morty and return the baby creature to her mother.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: After George and Harold T.P. the entire school with toilet paper, they are forced to flush it all down the toilet causing a giant explosion that turns the French teacher into the T.P. Mummy

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: When George and Harold want to win the school Avocadgrow contest, they accidentally turn their science teacher into a giant avocado monster

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny
programme.desc: When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss Baby encounters a new threat to Baby Love: an adorable Baby TV show starring Pyg the Pygmy Goat, Tam the Tamandua, and their host Maria-Maria. Boss is told not to go to Corporate War by Board Baby Emiliano, so Boss tries to provoke his enemies to make the first move.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business
programme.desc: Boss promises Tim he'll help make their parents' anniversary present, but after Puppy Co. and Baby Corp's fight over a conference room escalates, he sends Hendershot is his stead. Hendershot, armed with a file on all of Tim's wants and needs, tries to keep Tim happy.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: Guy is always surprising Eep with romantic gestures and Eep wants to return the favor. But when Guy proves impossible to surprise, Eep has to step up her game.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: The Crood and Betterman parents have been struggling to get along – they’re so different! The two couple realize they need some time apart and decide to get away from the farm and each other. Too bad both couples choose to take a break on the same, small beach.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree
programme.desc: While the parents are away, the kids are in charge of the tree house, but when the punch monkeys invade the house, the kids find themselves out of their element.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless “Heart of Fire Ruby” a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

It’s going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it’s too late.

programme.desc: Tom and the riders help Thunder, who is seeking revenge against the dragons that chased off his family.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants
programme.desc: George and Harold race against Mr. Krupp to try to get him fired before they get expelled

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight
programme.desc: There is more epic action and intrigue as Po and the Dragon Knights continue their quest to destroy the Tianshang weapons, but find themselves in treacherous waters when they are captured by pirates, one of which is out for revenge against Mr. Ping! The adventures lead them to London, where they are wanted by the Knights. Old enemies resurface and Blade will have to face one of her most challenging opponents—her mom. And somehow, Po finds himself in a chess tournament against the Queen of England!

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip and Oh use Slushious as an inter-planetary taxi but Tip takes it too far; Smek becomes homeless and must accept Oh's help.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh!
programme.desc: Tip gets carried away with Boov-tech and needs Oh's post office pals to save the day; Oh must participate in a ritual dance to become an adult Boov

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: Hardcase follows the crew to the desert and goes to extreme lengths attempting to finally get his revenge on Turbo. // White Shadow loses his good-luck charm and spirals into a streak of terrible luck and the crew must help him find it before things get any worse.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T.
programme.desc: During a visit to a racing convention Turbo is kidnapped by an overzealous fan and it's up to the rest of the FAST crew to save him. // Turbo throws a wild race for his fellow insects, but is surprised when his old nemesis, Guy Gagne, returns for a rematch.

programme.title: Dinotrux
programme.desc: The crew uses Lightning Bitbugs to light up the garage when Dozer needs a late-night repair, but need a new plan after Scrapadactyls attack.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show
programme.desc: Peabody and Sherman try to do the show in a new city but end up on the moon instead and must get home before astronauts take over the penthouse

programme.title: Casper's Scare School
programme.desc: Fleshed Out Wolfie wakes up one morning to every creature's nightmare?he's turned into a human! Messy Business At The Manor When Mosshead has nowhere to go for vacation, Casper invites him to stay at his uncles' house…where he quickly discovers that Mosshead is the world's worst houseguest.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective
programme.desc: Something very strange is happening in Brickabuild. Clockwork Mouse is giving all sorts of confusing orders to the builders and everything is chaos. Noddy realises that someone has put sticky putty on her clockwork key and it's making her run slowly. Noddy decides to investigate and find out who could have tried to damage the little mouse. Following all the clues and keeping track of all the evidence in his WhoWhatWhere Tablet, Noddy finds that the trail leads him to Carlton! But Carlton adores Clockwork Mouse! Noddy discovers that poor Carlton didn't meant to damage her; he just wanted to help her rest and not work so hard. Noddy has a brilliant idea. If Clockwork Mouse and Carlton work together, they can get all their jobs finished in half the time. And then there'll be plenty of time to rest – and play! Good idea Noddy!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service
programme.desc: Lauren and Sara lead a camping trip to the Scottish Highlands, but disaster strikes when Ajay and PC Selby are stuck in Pencaster with the tent and cooking equipment. Pat must transport them to the Highlands in the SDS Plane and put up the tent before nightfall in order to accomplish his mission. When a Highland cow gets into the tent and refuses to leave, Pat comes up with a plan for Alf to team up with Bill and coax the cow out with their father-and-son cow call - and Bill helps Alf move his own cow, who turns out to be missing Bill.

programme.title: Fifi and the Flowertots
programme.desc: Fifi has invited the other tots over to lunch but she is not very well. Bumble gamely steps in and offers to cook for her. What could possibly go wrong?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Zebby is upset when Raa Raa laughs at her rumbling tummy and runs off to hide. Raa Raa sets out to find his friend and apologise… he thinks it will be easy, he just has to listen out for the sound of her tummy, but who knew how many other rumbling noises there were?

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go!
programme.desc: When Tag and Scooch break Gilber’s ancient Golden Slipper, they embark on an adventure to a secret cave to retrieve the matching slipper. \ For community outreach day, the Race Cadets are paired with an elderly resident of Pawston. It's Tag and Scooch's job to take old dog Leo around town for a day of slow, relaxing activities. But when Leo wants to kickbarx, row and skydive, Tag and Scooch try their best to keep up.

programme.title: Not Quite Narwhal
programme.desc: Chef J tells a tale about unicorns sailing in ships on clouds in search of Unicorn Land.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: When Branch declares himself Prank Master Poppy gets evenTaking care of Mr. Dinkles is a bit harder than expected for Securityobsessed Branch.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On!
programme.desc: Convinced Troll Village is dangerous Branch makes a security plantPoppy creates an apology monster out of Gristle when teaching him how to make amends.

programme.title: Puss in Boots: The Three Diablos
programme.desc: After Puss in Boots is captured by soldiers he is enlisted to re-steal the priceless “Heart of Fire Ruby” a ruby stolen by the notorious, wicked and impossible-to-hear villain, known as The Whisperer. Puss must partner with the villain's henchmen, The Three Little Kittens, to seize the ruby. Babysitting has never been more dangerous. Will our hero Puss in Boots tame the Three Diablos in time to recover the ruby?

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Will and Jake Grimm are travelling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires genuine courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a news reporter find a quad of mutants which makes an alliance to unravel Shredder's plan as the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles.

programme.title: Blade Runner 2049
programme.desc: K, an officer with the Los Angeles Police Department, unearths a secret that could create chaos. He goes in search of a former blade runner who has been missing for over three decades.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: A gladiator who rose up from his beginnings as a slave races against time in order to rescue his beloved before an erupted volcano destroys the whole city.

programme.title: Star Trek: Nemesis
programme.desc: A generation's final journey begins when Captain Picard and the crew of the Enterprise encounter a monstrous alien race known as the Remans. Picard and his crew must risk everything to prevent this sinister villain from destroying Earth.

programme.title: The Patriot
programme.desc: Peaceful farmer Benjamin Martin is driven to lead the Colonial Militia during the American Revolution when a sadistic British officer murders his son.

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: After chimps infected with a deadly rage virus are freed, a global pandemic nearly wipes out humanity. A small group of survivors, led by Jim (Cillian Murphy), must navigate desolate London and find hope amidst the chaos.

programme.title: The Woman King
programme.desc: Inspired by true events, Viola Davis stars in an action-packed story of an elite all-female unit of warriors determined to defend their nation.

programme.title: Star Trek: Insurrection
programme.desc: In this most colorful and relaxed installment of Paramount's longest running series, Captain Picard leads his multicultural starship crew in a rebellion to save a planet from the very Federation they serve so proudly.

programme.title: Hancock
programme.desc: A tortured superhero crash-lands in Sheepshead Bay, Brooklyn, and tries to revitalize himself by romancing an alluring housewife, causing chaos in the city.

programme.title: Jurassic World
programme.desc: A theme park showcasing genetically-engineered dinosaurs turns into a nightmare for its tourists when one of the dinosaurs escapes its enclosure. An ex-military animal expert steps up to save the day.

programme.title: Jurassic World Rebirth: The Making Of A New Era
programme.desc: Journey to the most dangerous place on Earth in this broadcast special that takes you behind-the-scenes of JURASSIC WORLD REBIRTH. The stars and filmmakers transport you from Thailand to Malta, revealing sets, stunts and dinosaurs that have never been seen before.

programme.title: S.W.A.T.
programme.desc: An imprisoned drug kingpin offers a huge cash reward to anyone that can break him out of police custody, and only the L.A.P.D.'s Special Weapons and Tactics team can prevent it.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out Of The Shadows
programme.desc: Now the brothers must team up with April O'Neil and their new ally Casey Jones, to battle their enemies and face their biggest threat: the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Maoshan Heavenly Master
programme.desc: Prisoner Chi flees away under Master Zhang’s custody, causing the latter to be expelled from his clan. The war between human and demon has just begun!

Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brother’s death?

programme.desc: Four fearless chefs bid in an auction before each round to determine their fourth ingredient, resulting in an unpredictable competition.

programme.title: Man V. Food (S4)
programme.desc: Casey Webb's eating expedition brings him to Tucson, Arizona, where he faces off with a piled-high cheese and chile tamale pie, a hot dog taco with all the fixings.

programme.title: Man V. Food (S4)
programme.desc: Casey Webb's search for the biggest and best in Santa Fe, New Mexico, starts with a sopapilla stuffed with carne asada.

programme.title: House Of Knives (S1)
programme.desc: The chefs are challenged to create layered dishes in hopes of earning control of the game. One contender takes a sweet risk to stand out.

programme.title: Baked In Vermont (S1)
programme.desc: Gesine Prado makes a meal for football players from her husband's alma mater, Dartmouth College.

programme.title: Baked In Vermont (S1)
programme.desc: Gesine Prado invites a few friends for an apple-inspired brunch and cider-making in the barn.

programme.title: Nfl Tailgate Takedown (S1)
programme.desc: Sunny Anderson and Vince Wilfork host a battle of lobster rolls and Italian beef sandwiches as Teams New England Patriots and Chicago Bears try to score a win.

programme.desc: At the ranch, Guy Fieri wants to stretch it out. Chef Stephanie Izard pours a Poblano Mezquila Julep and Chef Maneet Chauhan makes Beef Keema Vindaloo.

programme.title: Guy's Ranch Kitchen (S7)
programme.desc: Chef Antonia Lofaso makes Quinoa Risotto, Chef Maneet Chauhan brings Bhel Puri Chaat, Chef Stephanie Izard serves Pork and Barley Spring Rolls.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: From the ancient Babylonians to modern day urban explorers, mankind has always been fascinated by abandoned places. What is the allure that draws us to these post-apocalyptic landscapes?

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: In the 1980s, groundbreaking technology doesn't just improve adult life, it redefines classic toys. Childhood staples are reimagined by innovators pushing the boundaries of entertainment technology.

programme.title: American Godfathers: The Five Families
programme.desc: The Last Don shows how a decidedly new, more aggressive commitment by law enforcement to 'eradicate' the mafia forces the families to find creative ways to stay in business and out of jail.

programme.title: Dark Marvels
programme.desc: Since ancient times through the modern day, brutal games thrill both players and spectators. We explore the origins of history's deadliest games — from Roman bloodsports to Russian roulette.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S16)
programme.desc: New evidence is being discovered that completely upends our understanding of this ancient culture... and might provide evidence that the Maya came in contact with extraterrestrial visitors.

programme.title: The Toys That Built The World (S2)
programme.desc: In the 1980s, groundbreaking technology doesn't just improve adult life, it redefines classic toys. Childhood staples are reimagined by innovators pushing the boundaries of entertainment technology.

programme.title: History's Greatest Mysteries (S3)
programme.desc: As the Cold War ramps up, a well-dressed man is found dead within miles of a nuclear testing site on a tranquil Australian beach. There are no clues to his identity, or what could have happened.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: Throughout history, many have sought the lost Ark of the Covenant. According to the Old Testament, God himself instructed Moses to build the Ark, and it is believed that it held the power of the Almighty.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner (S3)
programme.desc: From the ancient Babylonians to modern day urban explorers, mankind has always been fascinated by abandoned places. What is the allure that draws us to these post-apocalyptic landscapes?

programme.title: How Disney Built America
programme.desc: For nearly 70 years, Disney has pushed the boundaries of art and science through the work of a team of dreamers, designers, and builders known as the Imagineers.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens (S15)
programme.desc: The ancient Greeks built an empire that is considered the birthplace of Western Civilisation, and they credited their most monumental achievements to gods like Zeus, Apollo, and Poseidon.

programme.title: The Curse Of Oak Island (S10)
programme.desc: As time is running out, an exciting find in the swamp may have the fellowship rewriting the history of North America.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Past Alone participants Britt Ahart (Seasons 3 & 5), Jordan Jonas (Season 6 Winner) and Lucas Miller (Season 1) tackle one of their biggest challenges yet; building a massive Deadfall Trap.

programme.title: Alone: The Skills Challenge (S1)
programme.desc: Expert bushcrafters and former Alone participants Clay Hayes (Season 8), Callie North (Season 3) and Britt Ahart (Seasons 3 & 5) tackle the toughest challenge yet; building a working watercraft.

programme.title: Mountain Men (S12)
programme.desc: Kidd and Harry traverse through intense whitewater to reach the spawning grounds of steelhead trout. Jake loses his dogs after they follow lion tracks into remote and unfamiliar territory.

programme.title: The Secret Of Skinwalker Ranch (S4)
programme.desc: The team launches an incredible nighttime 200-drone light show experiment above the Triangle and the East Field leading to a startling sighting in the sky and new data that points toward possible answers.

programme.title: Swamp People (S14)
programme.desc: The Landry's target the legendary beasts of Cow Island. Daniel sets an ambitious goal to catch 10 alligators over 10 feet long. Ashley gambles on a new hunting ground.

programme.title: Mt.Yarigatake
programme.desc: Mt.Yarigatake is a superstar among Japan's mountains. From the peak, ridge lines stretch out toward the other summits, making it irresistible for hikers to experience of ridge traversal.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: CYCLE AROUND JAPAN
programme.desc: We travel the Izumo Highway, which has been used since ages past, and meet people who value human connection, such as a magatama jewelry artisan and a pro wrestler learning farming in a village.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Design X Stories
programme.desc: Today's theme: Wrapping. In Japan the art of wrapping and tying is a culture displaying beauty and thoughtfulness. It elevates the content and shows care. Join us for a rediscovery of wrapping design.

programme.title: Viewpoint Science
programme.desc: The proactive science education program which encourages primary and lower secondary school children to discover and investigate the mysteries which puzzle them.

programme.title: Story Land
programme.desc: Leading actors take turns as solo storytellers to act and recite traditional folk tales loved in Japan for centuries. Watch out, too, for the delightful illustrations!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo Mini
programme.desc: Our focus this time is honey. Innovations like urban beekeeping are born of a global bee crisis. Differing flowers and environments offer infinite flavors in this fascinating world of honey.

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: A Bedtime Routine
programme.desc: On those hot, humid summer nights, nothing can get in the way of sleep like mosquitoes on the hunt. We learn about the tools the Edo townspeople had at their disposal to fight the pesky insects.

programme.title: GRAND SUMO Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from July 18, Day 6 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Nagoya.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Spiritual Explorers
programme.desc: Gassan, revered as a sacred peak for 1,400 years, is where ancestral spirits are said to reside. Our explorer joins worshippers who climb to be with the dead.

programme.title: The Seasons of Yamato
programme.desc: A series of poetic videos by Koichi Hozan, a videographer living in Nara, in collaboration with a pianist, Mine Kawakami, for which she plays exclusive pieces, makes you experience each seasons.

programme.title: BOSAI

programme.desc: Morinaga Kunihiko (Fashion designer)visits Amami Oshima, Kagoshima. Priestesses on Amami wore patchwork robes with triangular butterfly designs, intended to protect the wearer from unseen spirits.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.desc: Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them. Famous wrong-way explorer, Travelling Travis accidentally takes Chickaletta to the North Pole.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Today is Adventure Bay's "Twin It To win It" pet show, where owners and their pets dress in matching outfits.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: When Buttons the deer needs to cross the Builder Cove airport's runway, Rubble & Crew know just what to build. Rubble & Crew build a supersized skateboard for Auntie Crane and River's show.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots find Dora's lost birthday cake and the family throws her a surprise birthday party! Dora and Boots help La Luna find the Luna Lily so everyone can enjoy the Moonlight Fiesta.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show
programme.desc: Chef wants to make a special dish for every single friend coming to Fwendsgiving. The gang treks to The Other Side of the Fence so Olly can pick the first blueberry of the season.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When a magic potion turns Crusher into a chicken, it's up to Blaze and AJ to collect three incredible potion ingredients and change him back into a Monster Machine...Before he's a chicken forever!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: It's the Robot Championship - and only the fastest, strongest, smartest robot will win! Using coding, can Blaze win enough sports to take home the Robot Championship trophy?

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol must save the day when two helpful robots take on more than they can handle. In a dream, Mayor Humdinger finds a Prism that makes rainbows and drains Adventure Bay of color.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: The Paw Patrol springs into action when a digging machine goes out-of-control. Digi and Tal, try to help Mayor Humdinger but leave the Mayor covered in jam.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: After a sudden snow storm, Everest cares for a wolf cub as they work together to help the PAW Patrol find them.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: It's the first day of school in Builder Cove... if Rubble & Crew can finish the building in time! The pups need a construction solution to save Farmer Zoe's crops.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: The pups jump into action to build an observatory to help their friend River get a cool picture of a shooting star! After meeting Park Ranger Rose, the pups get stuck on a nature trail.

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora helps Benny and Uni the Unicornasaurus get their magic paintbrush back so he can be reunited with his pet. Dora teams up with Hearty the Grumple so she can finally compete in the Grumple Games.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Vola, Goldie, Chucks, and Hank feel left out when they learn that Baby and William have been keeping a super secret. Fishy Force trains for their first big TV interview.

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Dennis challenges the Sharkpack to a game of 3-on-3 basketball, Sharkdog reveals he's an amazing player. So amazing, he may end up taking Max's spot!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Sharkdog comes down with a mysterious cold, Max knows Dad will be able to help him feel better. But things go haywire when the aquarium's robot doctor takes over the examination!

programme.title: Sharkdog
programme.desc: When Mom is assigned to investigate Sharkdog's wild side for the news, she realizes there's nothing scary about Max's best friend.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig has built a fantastic little train called “Gertrude” and he takes Peppa and George for a ride. Along the way they meet their friends and they all hop aboard.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Madame Gazelle takes Peppa and her school friends on a school bus trip to the mountains. From the top of the mountains there is a fantastic view and Peppa and her friends have fun hearing echoes.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are going to Rebecca Rabbit’s house today; it is inside a hill, with tunnels instead of stairs.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and her family are driving out to the countryside to go for a walk in the woods. Peppa and George discover trails of footprints left by little birds and ants.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Suzy Sheep has made up a pretend friend called “Leo Lion”. Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy says that Leo likes roaring and dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa has a French pen pal, a girl donkey, named Delphine. Although Peppa speaks English and Delphine speaks French, they discover that they love lots of the same things.

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Peppa and George are helping Granny and Grandpa Pig tidy their attic, but it's hard to decide what to throw out. Amongst the clutter, Peppa finds an old record player and some funny old records.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: On a trip to Paris, the Barbapapa family will discover the most incredible museum: the Louvre! Barbalala has decided to respect all the rules of the day of opposites.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa and Lolita spotted a flying saucer approaching their house. The Barbapapa have taken off aboard Bababam in the hope of discovering the planet of Baby Big Feet.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington builds a robot called PaddingTron that requires a real friend to work. Baaz invites everyone to celebrate Diwali with him and Paddington is his helpful assistant.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: Blaze super powers transforming him into... SUPER BLAZE!! And just in time; trouble Bots from outer space land in Axle City and start making a huge mess!

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise birthday ice cream cake up to Jake's cabin. Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge and need help from the PAW Patrol.

programme.title: PAW Patrol
programme.desc: Mr. Porter's delivery drones have gone out of control, and now they are air-dropping food everywhere! Mayor Humdinger steals Adventure Bay's Ferris Wheel.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show!
programme.desc: Baby gets carried away when he helps Grandma and Grandpa plan their vow renewal ceremony. Mommy Shark demonstrates a power that blows Baby away.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family!
programme.desc: Barbapapa finds refuge in the house that François' parents built for him. The house of Barbapapa is far too small now that Barbamama and the Barbabébé have arrived in his life.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington
programme.desc: Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match. The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still time for one last adventure!

programme.title: Rubble & Crew
programme.desc: There's a mystery afoot in Builder Cove! When the sculpture of all the townsfolk suddenly disappears, Chase joins Rubble & Crew to solve the case of the missing statue…

programme.title: DORA
programme.desc: Dora and Boots help Grumpy Old Troll untwist his tongue with Quickatoo's help. Dora and Boots help Chompy find another Cloud Flower Seed after he accidentally eats Isa's.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
programme.desc: When Crusher unleashes three of his most destructive creations on Axle City, there's only one hero strong enough to save the day: Robot Blaze!

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 2
programme.desc: Hey -- wish WE'D thought of that! TruTV counts down of the 20... uh, SMARTEST inventions to ever hit the market. There's a flask for your butt, a way to re-shape your meat, and the last doughnut security system you'll ever need. Our consumer-friendlycomics, including Sean Donnelly, Gilbert Gottfried, Chris Fairbanks, and Mike Trainor are on hand to finalize the sale. Order yours now!

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 3
programme.desc: Caution -- these people are operating motor vehicles under the influence of DUMB. TruTV is counting down the 20 most hysterical Motorheads on the road, in the sky, and on the water. See an out-of-control mail truck, a wild road-rager, and a man treating a motorbike like it's his girlfriend. Our cast of souped-up comedians, including Kevin McCaffrey, Chris Fairbanks, Rachel Feinstein, and Mike Trainor have pulled up to the curb with plenty to say.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 4
programme.desc: Not to boast, but we've got 20 of the World's Dumbest Show Offs and they're about to steal the show! From an out-of-control security guard to a dancer who kills it at a funeral - they all need attention, and they'll get plenty of it from our cast ofhilarious comedians, including Mike Britt, Rachel Feinstein and Gilbert Gottfried.

programme.title: World's Dumbest S16 5
programme.desc: Feel the endorphin rush as 20 of the World's Dumbest Thrillseekers do their thing. We've got a motorcycle crash, an out of control skydiver, even an angry bison. And one thing ties them all together - outrageous fails. With hair-raising commentary from our cast of comedians, including Michael O'Gorman, Jared Logan and Judy Gold

programme.title: Smallville S1 5
programme.desc: Clark has a chance to share a night out on the town with Lana, thanks to Lex's matchmaking, but the evening is interrupted when Clark faces an icy enemy, Sean Kelvin (MICHAEL CORISTINE).

programme.title: Magnum Force
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood stars as San Francisco Police Inspector Harry Callahan better known as "Dirty Harry" because of the tough way he pursues criminals in this bare-knuckled action film. Investigating the assassinations of crime bosses, Dirty Harry discovers the killers are police who, frustrated by the judicial system, have vowed to rid the city of crime by any means--even killing fellow police officers.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 9
programme.desc: The President chooses his Supreme Court nominee.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 3
programme.desc: While the pressures of being in space starts to take its toll on Howard, Amy feels threatened when Sheldon hires a young female assistant, Alex (guest star MARGO HARSHMAN).

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 4
programme.desc: When Howard returns from space, he doesn’t get the hero’s welcome he expected. Meanwhile, Game Night turns into a battle of the sexes.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 5
programme.desc: The gang celebrates Halloween at Stuart’s comic book store. Meanwhile Leonard and Penny discover a new spark in their relationship when he seduces her with science.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 6
programme.desc: Sheldon’s tenuous relationship with renowned scientist STEPHEN HAWKING is threatened by a game of “Words with Friends,” while Penny secretly enrolls in a class at the local college.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S6 7
programme.desc: Bernadette pressures Howard to move out of his mother's house.

programme.title: The West Wing S1 9
programme.desc: The President chooses his Supreme Court nominee.

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Set against the backdrop of the early 1960s, at the height of the Cold War, THE MAN FROM U.N.C.L.E. centers on CIA agent Solo (Man of Steel's Henry Cavill) and KGB agent Kuryakin (The Social Network's Armie Hammer). Forced to put aside longstanding hostilities, the two team up on a joint mission to stop a mysterious international criminal organization, which is bent on destabilizing the fragile balance of power through the proliferation of nuclear weapons and technology. The duo's only lead is the daughter of a vanished German scientist, who is the key to infiltrating the criminal organization, and they must race against time to find him and prevent a worldwide catastrophe.

programme.title: Barry Lyndon
programme.desc: Forced to leave Ireland after killing an English officer in a duel, handsome young Redmond Barry (O'Neal) seeks his fortune as a soldier in Prussia, as a spy then as a gambler living among the elite of Europe. He changes his name and marries an aristocrat (Berenson) for her wealth, but the acceptance he seeks finally eludes him.

programme.title: Smallville S1 5
programme.desc: Clark has a chance to share a night out on the town with Lana, thanks to Lex's matchmaking, but the evening is interrupted when Clark faces an icy enemy, Sean Kelvin (MICHAEL CORISTINE).

programme.title: Friends S5 1
programme.desc: Will Emily forgive Ross before their honeymoon? Monica and Chandler agree to end their new relationship.

programme.title: Friends S5 2
programme.desc: Ross' new wife won't speak to him. Rachel appoints Monica her advisor in romance. Phoebe feels neglected.

programme.title: Friends S5 3
programme.desc: While Phoebe delivers triplets, Joey experiences his own pain. Monica plans a date with a male nurse to spite Chandler.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S6 16
programme.desc: Joe, Q, Murr, and Sal are forced to get cheeky with interviewers and explain their lackluster resumes while trying to land a job at a mobile company. And tonight's loser witnesses a joining in matrimony that's anything but holy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 01
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q take their talents to Miami for the season premiere, pulling all new pranks on the beach. The guys zip around in scooters controlled by the other Jokers, and the loser will come face-to-face with an alligator.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 02
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q teach fencing, and one Joker is especially "en garde" when forced to face an Olympian. The guys trim away their dignity as hairstylists, and the punished Joker melts down during a presentation on climate change.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 03
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q host a team building seminar that's NOT safe for work, and later, they pose as caricature artists on a boardwalk. Plus, the wheels come off for tonight's loser as he faces a confused and unamused biker gang.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers S7 04
programme.desc: Joe, Sal, Murr, and Q hit the supermarket to mess with shoppers in an epic game of Hide-and-Sneak, the guys draw straws at a BBQ joint, and tonight's loser gets a bad case of stage fright while giving the performance of his life.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 23
programme.desc: When Sean is only allowed in the storage facility after hours, it results in the first ever day to night auction, ending in the dark! Will their flashlights illuminate big scores?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 24
programme.desc: Sean takes the bidders to the home of the L.A. County Fair for a behind the scenes tour. In a location that was built in 1922, there's no telling what might be up for auction. Who will win big underneath the grandstands?

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 25
programme.desc: The bidders take a trip out to Hawaii for an auction at a marine life park. T-Money places his bet on what's in a locked cabinet, while Brandon and Lori smell a great deal with old medical equipment.

programme.title: Storage Hunters S6 26
programme.desc: Still in Hawaii, Sean takes the bidders deep into the island to hidden storage bunkers. Conflict arises between the locals and Sean's usual's, but who will be victorious?

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: Travelogue
programme.desc: Travelogue is a 30-minute travel program. Through the journeys of our intrepid hosts, we experience the beauty, culture and mystery of China, discovering how people live in this vast country and showcasing China's transformation to the world.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The World Today is the core rolling service of CGTN. keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen.

programme.title: Leaders Talk
programme.desc: Leaders Talk is China Media Group’s new current affairs program featuring one-on-one interviews with heads of state and high-ranking government officials and heads of international organizations. They will share their insights on the major events shaping today’s world, providing an international viewpoint to understand our times, the visions we share, the challenges we face and the efforts we can make for a better future.

programme.desc: ABC Australia brings you Australian Rules football live in your lounge room every week with coverage of the 2025 AFL Premiership Season.

programme.desc: In 1980, Michael Parkinson interviewed Sir Robert Helpmann in an extensive one on one chat.

programme.title: Black Snow - Unfinished Business
programme.desc: In Ashford, residents gather at the local high school to unearth a time capsule from the 'class of 94'. Among the items is a letter from Isabel Baker who was murdered just a week before the time capsule was buried.

programme.title: Beyond Awesome - Timor Leste's Protein Champions
programme.desc: With malnutrition rates amongst the highest in the world, we go behind the scenes of a popular cooking show in Timor Leste that demonstrates how to create delicious and affordable protein-packed meals.

programme.title: Insiders - Episode 25
programme.desc: As our newly-elected and re-elected members of parliament prepare to return to Canberra for the Opening of the 48th Parliament on Tuesday, David Speers and the panel preview the week. Plus the washup from Tasmania's election.

programme.title: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
programme.desc: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

programme.desc: Lara Croft (Jolie) is back in action and faces her most perilous mission: to recover what ancient civilization believed to be the essence of all evil, Pandora's Box.

programme.title: A Fistful Of Dollars
programme.desc: A stranger in San Miguel becomes involved in a vendetta between two families. Playing one family against the other, he rescues a beautiful woman from captivity.

programme.title: The Lovely Bones
programme.desc: When 14-year-old Susie Salmon was murdered, she left her unfinished life behind. But now from her place in a strange but beautiful in-between world, she must help her father catch her killer and protect her family before she can finally move on. Filled with thrilling suspense, hope and the redeeming power of love.

programme.title: Confidence
programme.desc: Jake Vig is a con man with a gift for duplicity and a natural charm. Now he’s cooked up the con of a lifetime to even the score for the murder of a buddy, pay back those he owes, and get the hell out of the business while he’s still drawing breath.

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: After accidentally being left behind by boat staff, a vacationing couple find themselves stranded in the middle of the ocean, and at the mercy of a group of circling sharks.

programme.title: The Great Escape
programme.desc: Steve McQueen jumps on his motorcycle and leads the way in this thrill-packed adventure that blends top stars, a true-life WWII saga and Hollywood's gift for storytelling into a bravura, blockbuster film.

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. Is this entity a figment of her imagination or a vengeful spirit? As she struggles to control her thoughts and actions, can she stop herself from hurting those around her?

programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: They Wait in the Dark
programme.desc: Amy and her adopted son Adrian flee from her abusive ex-girlfriend Judith. Seeking refuge in an abandoned farmhouse in Amy's Kansas hometown, they confront a supernatural evil force from her dark past that haunts Adrian. As Judith pursues them, Amy and Adrian must face the dangers both outside and within the house.

programme.title: Impermanence
programme.desc: A series of strange events is happening in a peaceful village, including a corpse that is resurrected from its grave and ran away. As the villagers investigate, a villain dies and the village head also goes missing. Police investigation ensues, but as the truths start to unveil, more mysteries are unfolding. Who is the one behind them all?

programme.title: Inside The Boys
programme.desc: Adapted from a true paranormal event, it is said that people working in the morgue at midnight encounter haunted events as many dead bodies are kept in the college hospital. When a few medical students experience a series of horrifying incidents after leaving the morgue at midnight, the campus is shrouded in terror.

programme.title: Chapter 1 Mae Nak Reborn
programme.desc: Mae Nak the ghost wife returns to take revenge for a pregnant woman who is sexually assaulted and loses her baby. No one can identify the assailant except Mae Nak, who turns into an evil spirit in order to punish the assailant for his evil deeds.

programme.title: 3AM
programme.desc: A woman in hospital accidentally discovers her husband’s affair. On the verge of breakdown, she begins to encounter a “stranger” who claims to also be a victim of the affair. programme.title: Bunshinsaba: Hoichi the Earless
programme.desc: You Mei brings home an abandoned doll found on the street. Little does she know that it is possessed by an evil spirit which causes the sudden death of her colleague. You Mei seeks help from a ghost hunter who unleashes the pencil spirit to fight against the evil spirit, unfortunately leading to a series of terrifying events…

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after a masked killer brutally murdered all her friends, Camryn struggles to live a normal life as she tries to come to terms with the traumatic experience. Just when she thinks she might be ready to finally start anew, Camryn suspects that the killer has come back for her...

programme.title: Red Rain
programme.desc: Based on true events, a young scientist who specialises in the study of aliens and extraterrestrials sets out to uncover the mystery behind a series of strange occurrences in Kerala.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: Night at the Eagle Inn
programme.desc: A pair of fraternal twins spend a terrifying night in a remote inn to investigate the last known whereabouts of their father who mysteriously disappeared the night they were born. As they dive deeper, the property's dark secrets ensnare them in a hellish labyrinth which they must escape before dawn.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Jia Hao and his friends gather to celebrate his birthday at a villa. However, the festivities take a dark turn when they connect to a deadly VR game in which they must light candles and dodge ghosts to survive. Tragedy strikes as two of his friends fall victim to the escalating horrors within, plunging them all deeper into a chilling nightmare.

programme.title: Sinister
programme.desc: Si Nan and her husband travel to Kuala Lumpur for a vacation to relieve her pregnancy stress. However, she soon uncovers his evil plan to turn their child into a 'Luk Krok' for profit, which puts her in grave danger. With the help of the hotel ghosts, she manages to flee and alert the police to arrest him, finally giving birth to her child.

programme.title: Les Croquemoutard
programme.desc: The Kiddycrunchers are a family of Trolls who have been forced to leave their home under the bridge and move into the Shoebox Housing Project to Iive amongst human beings! They discover community life and find that it isn't easy to live amongst these scrumptious creatures with their odd ways!

programme.title: Comme Des Tetes Pas De Poule
programme.desc: Thinking she's upset Pierre-Charles, Flavie is being as nice as pie, in fact so nice that he finally gets up the courage to admit he loves her. On the eve of the elections, Ian pulls out all the stops to overtake his rival.

programme.title: Ernest Et Celestine, La Collection
programme.desc: Ernest, a grumpy bear with a generous heart, offers a home to Celestine, a mischievous little orphan mouse, in his tumbledown house. Two friends with characters as different as their size; but that doesn't stop them enjoying endless adventures filled with fun and fantasy.

programme.title: Les Grandes Grandes Vacances
programme.desc: July 1940. The village is occupied. The houses are invaded by German soldiers and Ernest and Colette have to live alongside them at the farm. Fortunately, they quickly find their grandparents from whom they had been separated.

programme.title: Matiere Grise (30') 2025 Rtbf
programme.desc: The magazine programme which takes the mystery out of science, encouraging us to think... without all the brain work!

programme.title: Mission Apprentis
programme.desc: In front of the cameras and within a limited time, six apprentices will have to take on a professional challenge and give their best to convince experts.

programme.title: Beau Velo De Ravel (Le) 2025 Rtbf
programme.desc: A bike journey, presented by Adrien Joveneau, along the entire RAVeL network, an independent cycle path network in Wallonia. With each programme, the presenter tells us of a stage in his journey and talks about mobility and tourist resources in the region.

programme.title: Le Magazine De La Riviera
programme.desc: The magazine programme all about the art of living in Monaco, Provence and on the Cote d'azur.

programme.title: Waouh !
programme.desc: Nathalie Simon travels the French regions to meet extreme sports enthusiasts. Land, water, air: no matter their preferred playground, they share their passion and favourite places. They also offer a unique way to explore an area of the country. From high-level athletes to adrenaline junkies, there's emotion and excitement a-plenty!

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Born in Senegal, Yacine Diouf joins her sister in Reunion Island in 1998 and lives there for nearly twenty years without papers, doing odd jobs. After regularizing her situation, she discovers her vocation as an energy healer and decides to offer this gift to sick people.

programme.title: Le Match Dans Le Match
programme.desc: Interview with Fabrice Pastor, founder and director of the A1 Padel circuit. He talks about his career, his discovery of this sport and its evolution, the creation of his circuit.

programme.title: Le Telejournal De Radio-Canada
programme.desc: The televised news programme from the Radio-Canada team.

programme.title: Pa T'mentir
programme.desc: Toxic masculinity is everywhere, recognising no skin colour, nationality, or even social class. Schelby, Keithy and Irdens come to agree that, in their environment, it is still difficult to denounce the problems it causes.

programme.title: Serge a Paris
programme.desc: Serge talks about Parisian cliches with the novelist Irene Frain from Brittanny. He then joins singer Daniel Lavoie, who confides in him that his primary source of inspiration is and has always been love.

programme.title: Via Idra, Entre Terre Et Ciel
programme.desc: Our trek along the Via Idra continues from Campo Tencia to the Alpe Sponda mountain hut, and a spot of high altitude fishing! Then on from the Sponda hut to that of Cognora, in the Valle Verzasca and an opportunity to admire the Pizzo Barone.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: The Ritz: more than just a hotel, a global brand. All about the origins of the word ''Fashion''. Jerome Lair makes and restores stringed instruments. Wearing Klein blue. We join Texto Dallas in his studio, where he transforms nails into veritable works of art!

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: In the heart of the Marais district in Paris, the National Archives Museum hosts works dating back several centuries. French designer and architect Herve Van der Straeten opens the doors to his workshop. Style by Alessandro Michele for Valentino. We meet up with ceramic artist Alison Thirion.

programme.title: Questions Pour Un Champion
programme.desc: A general knowledge quiz.

programme.title: Le Miracle Suisse
programme.desc: The programme that (finally) explains the ins and outs of Swiss well-being, and offers the keys to understanding that renowned ''swiss attitude. A fun guide to Homo Helveticus, using archive footage from years past and recent times, all in a light-hearted, sunny mood with plenty of laughter thrown in.

programme.title: On Est Rendu La
programme.desc: Thomas, E?merick and Ariane keep active to assert themselves, assume their individuality and make the world of sport more open. They are the proof that sport is evolving in accordance with the values of young people today.

programme.title: Tv5Monde, Le Journal
programme.desc: All the national and international news from the TV5MONDE news staff.

programme.title: Adamo, Le Film De Sa Vie
programme.desc: In a journey full of intimacy and surprises, the life of Salvatore Adamo is recounted by seventeen of his fans. In the company of Bruno Tummers and Joelle Scoriels, seated in the front row of the Theâtre royal de Mons, the artist relives the highlights of his career, projected on the big screen.

programme.title: C'est Archive Pres De Chez Vous
programme.desc: Jean-Luc Fonck invites Salvatore Adamo to relive the 1960s through the magic of archive footage and images. With a 19 year-old FranCoise Hardy, the Rolling Stones in Brussels in 1964 plus Alain Delon and his wild ride with Marianne Faithfull.

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Everything is going wrong at the theatre: rehearsals are increasingly tense, the result of everyone's personal problems, and the selection date for the competition has finally been announced. But will they be ready in time?

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Wilfried, the drug dealer, could help Jacob, if Lionel is prepared to do something for him in return. With her mother, Emily finds an idea that could finally enable her to take part in the selection. When he discovers he hasn't been listened to, Emily's father takes a radical decision.

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: After managing to find her father's contact details, Nathalie decides to get in touch with him. Marianne, disappointed with the youngsters' lack of effort and application, has a complicated choice to make. Lionel's father's pays Nathalie a visit to explain that he had never offered his son sufficient support.

programme.title: Zetwal Caraïbes
programme.desc: Ambroise has to make a decision that is both responsible but also fatal. Lionel and Nathalie patch things up between them. It's time to leave for Guadeloupe and all four are buzzing with excitement. Nathalie makes the most of the trip to meet her father, accompanied by Lionel.

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: The Ritz: more than just a hotel, a global brand. All about the origins of the word ''Fashion''. Jerome Lair makes and restores stringed instruments. Wearing Klein blue. We join Texto Dallas in his studio, where he transforms nails into veritable works of art!

programme.title: Jean-Michel Jarre - 14 Juillet Aux Francofolies De La Rochelle 2024
programme.desc: He is a visionary, avant-garde artist, a pioneer of electronic music. His original sounds and live performances have propelled him to the top international stages. His concerts attracted millions of spectators. For the first time, Jean-Michel Jarre performs at the Francofolies, bringing the festival to a fitting close.

programme.title: Version FranCaise
programme.desc: In the heart of the Marais district in Paris, the National Archives Museum hosts works dating back several centuries. French designer and architect Herve Van der Straeten opens the doors to his workshop. Style by Alessandro Michele for Valentino. We meet up with ceramic artist Alison Thirion.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Les Secrets De La Foret De Nuages
programme.desc: Today under threat, cloud forests only make up 4% of the planet's woodland areas. These high altitude ecosystems, bathed in a thick blanket of fog, shelter exceptional levels of biodiversity. Twenty-five years ago, the French film-maker Philippe Molins fell in love with Los Yaltes, Ecuador. We discover its secrets.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rtbf
programme.desc: Complete international news roundup presented by the RTBF news staff.

programme.title: Noir Comme Neige
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the rampage in the ski resort of Nobleval. Constance Vivier, French police officer with a high altitude unit, teams up with the Swiss policeman Andreas Meyer. After two bodies are found, the countdown is on to prevent more victims being added to the list.

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Born in Senegal, Yacine Diouf joins her sister in Reunion Island in 1998 and lives there for nearly twenty years without papers, doing odd jobs. After regularizing her situation, she discovers her vocation as an energy healer and decides to offer this gift to sick people.

programme.title: Le Journal De La Rts
programme.desc: All the news from RTS.

programme.title: Le Journal De France 2
programme.desc: The television news programme of the France 2 editorial board (8 p.m. edition, Paris time).

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 1Re Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: 64' Le Monde En FranCais - 2E Partie
programme.desc: International current affairs as seen by the French-speaking world.

programme.title: L'invite
programme.desc: Patrick Simonin hosts the stars in the headlines, culture, music, film, books, an unmissable rendezvous with all those who light up our times.

programme.title: 64' L'essentiel
programme.desc: The whole world, in French.

programme.title: Pompon Ours
programme.desc: Seven year-old Pompon is a little bear cub. Full of mischief, he also has a precious talent that delights his best friend Rita and his parents: he can take something ordinary and make it amazing. Thanks to his extraordinary imagination, growing up from day to day becomes child's play.

programme.title: Le Petit Prince Et Ses Amis
programme.desc: Elijah and Charlotte join the Little Prince aboard his asteroship, along with his fantastic crew: Fox and Rose. In this unknown universe, they head off on a voyage of discovery amongst the planets and stars. And as they explore the world, they also make plenty of new friends.

programme.title: Conte-Nous !
programme.desc: A long, long time ago, in the heart of the African savannah, animals still had the gift of speech. It was also a time of story-telling, of tales that had so much to teach us, where the main character was a lion, a hyena, a leopard or a frog.

programme.title: Sam & Julia
programme.desc: Arriving from a faraway island, Julia the little mouse moves into a new home with her mother. There she meets Sam, another young mouse who's long lived with his parents and a whole gang of brothers and sisters. They quickly become inseparable and enjoy a host of fun adventures together.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Idefix Et Les Irreductibles
programme.desc: 52 before JC. The city of Lutecia is occupied by the Romans... Completely? No! A gang of invincible animals led by Idefix resist the invader again and again and its plans to romanise the city.

programme.title: Le Petit Geek
programme.desc: What exactly does an influencer do? How do you create a video game? Why are screens dangerous, and what about digital identities? In each episode children shed light on today's virtual world.

programme.title: Sari Saring Sine: Astig
programme.desc: Two police informants assume tough personas to con money from small-time criminals. But all their wise-cracking pretense traps them to be part of a crime boss's major operations.

programme.title: Encounter ep 23
programme.desc: A story of two strangers meeting at the most unlikely place and sharing an important moment, not knowing that they will be soon be brought togetheragain by fatte, fall in love, and challenged by the very different worlds they live in.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 9
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: For the Love ep 2
programme.desc: An episodic TV series touching on various kinds of love stories based on modern hits and classics from Viva Records.

programme.title: Da Pers Family ep 9
programme.desc: A story of a couple who preserves the family bakery business legacy from closure. Now the couple’s children, volunteers to step in and help the business. Are the parents willing to accept change and innovations of the new generation?

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 1
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: Kurdapya ep 4
programme.desc: Kurdapya tells the story of long-lost twins, KURING & DAPHNE. They meet after a strange accident and discover that they lead extremely different lives. Kuring grew up with the cruel extended family in the province while Daphne is an undervalued publishing executive in the city. Both women want to get out of their current realities, so they decide to switch lives by pretending to be each other.

programme.title: The Rain in España ep 9
programme.desc: The Rain in España follows the story of Kalix, a student hailing from a family of doctors who decided to tread a different path and take up Legal Management at Ateneo de Manila University. During his stay there, he crosses paths with Luna, an Architecture student from the University of Santo Tomas

programme.title: Mga Kwentong Epik: Maria Makiling ep 2
programme.desc: Live action series of original Epik superheroes and comic book characters.

programme.title: Sing Galing Season 3 Ep 28 (Semifinals)
programme.desc: Sing Galing is a Philippine videoke singing reality game show. The contestants must know the right lyrics to any randomly chosen song, be it Filipino or foreign, without going out of tune. If the contestant fails to sing the right lyrics and in tune, an animated genie would pop up on the screen and strike an animated gong to signal the end of the unfortunate aspirant's chance at instant wealth and glory.

programme.title: Masked Singer S3 ep 9 Part 1
programme.desc: New Season, new masked singers, exciting twists and triple the fun on the third season of Masked Singer Pilipinas

programme.title: Ghost Adventures S2 ep 2
programme.desc: Since the end of Season 1, Par Jack (Benjie Paras) has made his ghost whispering ability a full-time business and is now a popular Ghost Whisperer in the country. Still with the help of his sidekicks, Nik and Bur, they now conduct business at their new facility, Day Scare Center.

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 6
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: The Mysterious Case of Ana Madrigal ep 2
programme.desc: Christine, an up and coming investigative journalist (Maui Taylor) is hot on the trail of a cold case for her new television show. This cold case is close to her heart because the victim happens to be her estranged half sister, Ana Madrigal. Together with her TV crew, Christine attempts to uncover the truth behind what really happened on the night of her sister's death - even if it kills her.

programme.title: Bella Bandida ep 6
programme.desc: Loosely based on Francisco V. Coching's comic book of the same name, the story follows Bella, a medical doctor in her late 20's whose mission on life is to give back to her hometown, Santiago. Bella is in a relationship with Brick, the town councilor, and the nephew of the town mayor, Tigro.

programme.title: Totoy Bato ep 50
programme.desc: Totoy Bato explores the origins, the pathos of the character Totoy. All the different battle he went through (terrorist, revenge for his wife, corruption, prejudice and for love) defines him as a character.
